::Battera::

She blushed again and clutches the fruit bowl tighter. 
"I..ah..don't know what to say. Thank you."
She thought a moment, "You mean you'd actually give up fighting? Just 
for me? So if I asked you to stop fighting, you would?" She couldn't 
believe her luck."Gee, I hope all the other bots are as nice as you 
are.  I mean, trying to get peace talks going would be a lot easier 
if all the other bots were like you." She smiled and walked with him.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm shruggs. "I like fighting."
> 
> He looks Battera over again, "But for a nice girl like you, I'd 
give it up!"
